Articles.Content:
Hi

just bought the game a few days ago after watching alot of videos on youtube.

Loveing it so far ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
Hello Granen, and welcome to the forum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Hey! It's the king of Salt!

...Oh wait, wrong TV show. Nevertheless, we do share the aspect in which we have cookies and beverages of all kinds. Enjoy them, as well as your time here!
